title: Option to disable the "aaahh" sound effect when you tap the notification?
body: It's uncomfortably loud on my phone and I think it doesn't add any value to the app's main functionality.

title: Spanish translation
body: My little bit of sand to contribute to this application. Thanks.

title: Ability to disable sounds/vibration
body: I think it's worth giving a user some customization as to whether they want sounds to play or vibrations to work - I personally don't like my devices making any sounds and elect for relying on my pants pockets to vibrate instead.

title: Higher-quality audio
body:
The present audio clips have quite a bit of noise and utilize a sub-optimal codec. As an example, I have recorded a new 'aaahhh' sample that could be used (just for an example). If you're interested in using it I give it to you, licensed under the CC0 license. 

I would advise usage of the .ogg file format as the quality is quite a bit superior to mp3/m4a. However, here is a .wav in which you are free to do whatever you wish with it.

[link removed]

title: HydroMemo Fails to open
